Place units and buildings on the game board and use them to achieve victory! But choose wisely, because youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be fighting to survive against the elements and prehistoric foes.

BONK AND SMASH!
Unleash powerful special abilities. Send a Sabertooth flying with the WarriorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Bonk. Stun a snarling T-Rex with your Slinger. Use your Hunter to lure a hungry dinosaur into an ambush.
